widget.comment:
It is not possible, to create
a save file with this editor.
Start a new game, open the menu and
'Quick Save' the game.

Do not set the crown as 'Start with power up'
while you have set 'Start as...' to blue or yellow Toad!!!
The game will CRASH!
You can start with Mario or Luigi and
set 'start with power up' to crown,
if you want to see Mario/Luigi headless

You won't see a Yoshi following you,
but he will be there, if you start a level ;)

The following option enables the 'Save' feature.
No more 'Quick Save' ;)

Do not set the crown as 'Start with power up'
